# requiredAuthorizations

**Type Property**

The authorization types that an environment light estimation provider requires.

## Declaration

```swift
static var requiredAuthorizations: [ARKitSession.AuthorizationType] { get }
```

## Type properties

- **isSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a device supports the environment light estimation provider.
